column1: #Text=" Toph says : " The first time was for cleaning , but the second time 's just for the sweet picking sensation !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka 's been in charge of the schedule .
#Text=I 'm not sure what we should be doing .
#Text=" Toph says : " Plus , it 's so hot today .
#Text=" Aang says : " How hot is it ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I du n no .
#Text=" Katara says : " I - It 's so hot , it 's so hot ... Momo is shedding like Appa .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess the jokes do n't run in the family .
